Description:
Period Poise and Contemporary Elegance
The finest of Federation family homes featuring sunbathed interiors of gracious dimensions, exceptional four-bedroom accommodation and sensational sunset views! A rare idyllic sanctuary that magically transports you far from the stresses of any work day, where you can savour the picturesque rooftop outlook to the soothing sounds of the tiered cast iron water feature. Complemented by modern comforts throughout with exquisite indoor-outdoor entertaining that luxuriously pampers with a first-class open floorplan incorporating an ambient alfresco deck and tranquil landscaped gardens.
Nestled within a serene and sought after Essendon street with a gorgeous Federation façade incorporating a laced veranda wrapping from the front door around to the brick paved 3-car driveway. The period fence with a remote sliding gate opens to a low maintenance front garden of roses and two stunning well-established Japanese Maples creating a private retreat to welcome you home and enjoy the morning paper with a coffee.
A stunning wide hallway entry is enhanced by a fresh creamy decor, soaring ceilings with deep period cornices, ceiling roses and arch fretwork, honeyed floorboards and a rich leadlight side window. All four bedrooms are of impressive proportions with built in robes, two with fireplaces and all sharing two bathrooms, one period in styling with a claw-foot bath, the other in keeping with the more modern kitchen.
A sundrenched rear living zone perfectly captures a spectacular outlook with vast windows, glassed French doors and the substantial outdoor room with period fretwork. Encompasses a dining room adjoining to a superb central lounge with a period fireplace and a chef's kitchen that's also accessed via the hallway. A refined modern kitchen features cream cabinetry and stone benchtops, under-mount twin Franke sinks, an appliance servery with a sliding door, 900mm SS oven with gas cooktop, Miele dishwasher and an island bench with breakfast bar.
Inclusive of an alarm, hydronic heating, living room split aircon, hallway linen press, a secure and picturesque rear garden. Ideally located in a much coveted Essendon street walking distance to elite schools, Buckley St shops and cafes, Essendon Train, Clarinda park, the Maribyrnong River and parkland trails. Easy access to freeway and airports.
